returning subscribers only. Must be 18+. After 3 months, auto-renews at then-current monthly retail price (currently $7.99/mo) until canceled. </span><span class="fine"><a href="#modal-d-basic-additional-terms" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="mlp_link" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Modal - Additional Disney+ Basic offer terms apply." data-testid="mlp_link_section"><span>Additional Disney+ Basic offer terms apply.</span></a></span></p></div></div></section><section class="sidealign side-by-side text-container-right mobile-container-bottom" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="mlp_body" data-gv2-type="mlp_body" data-gv2-index="3" data-analytics-section="body:Side Align - Watch the Way You Want :3"><picture class="sidealign-image"><source media="(min-width: 1025px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/70804ae39eccb3c580b2a9ce48cc9e8d9ab290fa548809732daf8282eb955521/original"><img src="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/70804ae39eccb3c580b2a9ce48cc9e8d9ab290fa548809732daf8282eb955521/original" width="712" height="570" alt="4 Devices showcasing the Disney+ product on TV, Mobile, Laptop, and Tablet" loading="lazy"></picture><div class="text-container" aria-label=""><h2>Watch the way you want</h2><p></p><ul><li><p>Host virtual movie nights with GroupWatch. Pause, rewind, and react with up to six friends. To invite or be invited to join GroupWatch, subscription is required.</p></li><li><p>Download any movie or series and watch it on the go. </p></li><li><p>Keep your family safe with easy parental controls.</p></li><li><p>An ever-growing range of titles in stunning 4K UHD and Dolby Atmos sound on compatible devices.</p></li><li><p>Stream on up to four devices at the same time.</p></li></ul></div></section><section class="sidealign overlay text-container-right default" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="mlp_body" data-gv2-type="mlp_body" data-gv2-index="4" data-analytics-section="body:Side Align - Mid Page Bundle CTA - Bundle Rebrand - 12/08/22:4"><picture class="sidealign-image"><source media="(max-width: 768px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/e846551500438839c65a2963cfc2deacc46913b1f4ef203919014da450550fdf/original"><source media="(min-width: 769px) and (max-width: 1024px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/3b592484b3c8166480d0946a150e235a10e308d6827a40df2ba1b897c892c8f1/original"><source media="(min-width: 1025px)" src="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/3efdfc3a35116786922199df5b608309fde889edb654ef047600387fd197075c/original" width="2160" height="740" alt="Disney Bundle" loading="lazy"></picture><div class="text-container" aria-label=""><h4>Get your favorite stories, originals and live sports with Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+</h4><a href="/sign-up?type=bundle" class="large primary" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="bundle_cta" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Button - CTA - GET ALL THREE - Bundle Trio - D+ Colour" data-testid="bundle_cta_sidealign"><span>GET ALL THREE</span></a><p><span class="fine"><a href="#modal-bundle-terms-apply-2022" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" Apply.</span></a></span></p></div></section><section id="devices" class="center" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="mlp_body" data-gv2-type="mlp_body" data-gv2-index="5" data-analytics-section="body:Section - 4 Column Grid - Available on your favorite DEVICES:5"><h2>Available on your favorite devices<br></h2><p class="text-medium"></p><ul class="grid-list four-column mobile-two-column middle"><li class="grid-item center"><picture class="device"><source media="(min-width: 1025px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/00fb59319fa715222100d8a84d11bc7e23a42970b4f413c9e85166d0cfba9346/original"><img src="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/00fb59319fa715222100d8a84d11bc7e23a42970b4f413c9e85166d0cfba9346/original" width="800" height="400" alt="TV icon" loading="lazy"></picture><h3>TV</h3><p class="text-medium">Amazon Fire TV<br>Android TV devices<br>AppleTV<br>Chromecast<br>LG TV<br>Roku<br>Samsung<br>Xfinity X1 &amp; Flex<br>Hisense <br>Panasonic</p></li><li class="grid-item center"><picture class="device"><source media="(min-width: 1025px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/d73b7c534afd2af2a454dbd47bd6c766c70e334ce8137084e9cd25c2644dd267/original"><img src="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/d73b7c534afd2af2a454dbd47bd6c766c70e334ce8137084e9cd25c2644dd267/original" width="800" height="400" alt="Computer icon" loading="lazy"></picture><h3>Computer</h3><p class="text-medium">Chrome OS<br>MacOS<br>Windows PC</p></li><li class="grid-item center"><picture class="device"><source media="(min-width: 1025px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/66475056e769443ef9a491a48dfa44059c8964890ae9ef7c4f69f322693c59d8/original"><img src="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/66475056e769443ef9a491a48dfa44059c8964890ae9ef7c4f69f322693c59d8/original" width="800" height="400" alt="Mobile &amp; Tablet icon" loading="lazy"></picture><h3>Mobile &amp; Tablet</h3><p class="text-medium">Amazon Fire Tablets<br>Android Phones &amp; Tablets<br>iPhone and iPad</p></li><li class="grid-item center"><picture class="device"><source media="(min-width: 1025px)" srcset="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/51b639d2ebe97ee175975c29d42a90b0e043713856db8e5d6d9fb87b2b3a48c0/original"><img src="//cnbl-cdn.bamgrid.com/assets/51b639d2ebe97ee175975c29d42a90b0e043713856db8e5d6d9fb87b2b3a48c0/original" width="800" height="400" alt="Game controller icon" loading="lazy"></picture><h3>Game Consoles</h3><p class="text-medium">PS4<br>PS5<br>Xbox One<br>Xbox Series X<br>Xbox Series S</p></li></ul></section><section class="center" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="mlp_body" data-gv2-type="mlp_body" data-gv2-index="6" data-analytics-section="body:Section - Accordion - FAQs - US - 6 Items - D+ Basic Offer - 2/1/23:6"><h2>Frequently Asked Questions</h2><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click"><span>What is Disney+?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">Disney+ is the streaming home of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, and more. From new releases to your favorite classics and exclusive Originals, there&#x27;s something for everyone.</span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click"><span>How much does Disney+ cost?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">Access unlimited entertainment with Disney+ Basic or Disney+ Premium:</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Basic: Limited time offer for Disney+ (With Ads) for the price of $6.99/month for 3 months. Then auto-renews at $7.99/month*</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Premium: Disney+ (No Ads) for the price of $10.99/month or $109.99/year</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="medium">Save over 16%** on </span><span class="medium"><a href="/sign-up?skuInterval=annual&amp;toggle=shown" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="standalone_cta_annual" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Disney+ Premium (No Ads)" data-testid="standalone_cta_annual_section"><span>Disney+ Premium (No Ads)</span></a></span><span class="medium"> with an annual plan for $109.99/year</span><i><span class="medium"> </span></i><br><span class="fine">*New and eligible returning subscribers only. Must be 18+. After 3 months, auto-renews at then-current monthly retail price (currently $7.99/mo) until canceled. </span><span class="fine"><a href="#modal-d-basic-additional-terms" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="mlp_link" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Modal - Additional Disney+ Basic offer terms apply." data-testid="mlp_link_section"><span>Additional Disney+ Basic offer terms apply.</span></a></span><br><span class="fine">**Savings compared to 12 months of the monthly price of Disney+ Premium (No Ads).</span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click"><span>What can I watch on Disney+?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">With Disney+, you can choose from an always-growing collection of stories.</span></p><p></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">New releases and timeless classics</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Exclusive new Original Movies and Series</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Exciting specials and limited-time streaming events</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Nostalgic throwbacks and past seasons of your favorite shows</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">The entire Skywalker Saga and much of the Marvel Cinematic Universe</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Beloved and experimental shorts</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Documentaries, unscripted series, and so much more</span></p></li></ul></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click"><span>Where can I watch Disney+?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">The Disney+ app is available on mobile devices, web browsers, game consoles, set-top boxes, and smart TVs. For a complete list of supported devices, click </span><span class="medium"><a href="https://help.disneyplus.com/csp?id=csp_article_content&amp;sys_kb_id=eac89167db3048900a2af56e0f96193b" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="mlp_link" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Click Here - FAQ Supported Devices List" data-testid="mlp_link_section"><span>here</span></a></span><span class="medium">.</span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click"><span>What&#x27;s included on the Disney+ plans with and without ads?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">You can now get the following plans with Disney+ and choose your streaming experience: </span></p><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Basic: </span><span> Limited time offer for Disney+ (With Ads) for the price of $6.99/month for 3 months. Then auto-renews at $7.99/month*</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Thousands of award-winning classics and Originals</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">The ability to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Over 300 titles in 4K UHD and HDR</span></p></li></ul><p></p><p><span class="medium">Disney+ Premium: Disney+ (No Ads) for $10.99/month or $109.99/year</span></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Thousands of award-winning classics and Originals</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">The ability to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Over 300 titles in 4K UHD and HDR</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Unlimited downloads on up to 10 devices</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Groupwatch</span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Dolby Atmos</span></p></li></ul><p><span class="fine">*New and eligible returning subscribers only. Must be 18+. After 3 months, auto-renews at then-current monthly retail price (currently $7.99/mo) until canceled. </span><span class="fine"><a href="#modal-d-basic-additional-terms" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="mlp_link" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Modal - Additional Disney+ Basic offer terms apply." data-testid="mlp_link_section"><span>Additional Disney+ Basic offer terms apply.</span></a></span></p></div></div><div class="accordion-container"><button class="accordion-btn h5" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="expand_collapse" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click"><span>What is the Disney Bundle?</span></button><div class="accordion-child"><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle plans include subscriptions to either Disney+ and Hulu, or Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+, at discounted prices, as compared to the retail price of each subscription when purchased separately.</span></p><p><span class="medium">Choose between the following Disney Bundle plans:</span></p><p></p><ul><li><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle Duo Basic for $9.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads) and Hulu (With Ads) </span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle Trio Basic for $12.99/month, which includes Disney+ (With Ads), Hulu (With Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads) </span></p></li><li><p><span class="medium">Disney Bundle Trio Premium for $19.99/month, which includes Disney+ (No Ads), Hulu (No Ads), and ESPN+ (With Ads) </span></p></li></ul><p></p><p><span class="medium">With Disney+, you get new releases, classics, series, and Originals from the creators at Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and Nat Geo. </span><br></p><p><span class="medium">With Hulu, you can enjoy current hits, comfort classics, award-winning originals, and movies everyone is talking about. </span></p><p></p><p><span class="medium">And with ESPN+, you can stream live sports, thousands of live events, top leagues and tournaments, ESPN+ Originals, and the complete 30 for 30 Library. Plus, get exclusive access to premium articles, fantasy tools, and archives.</span></p><p></p><p><span class="medium"><a href="/sign-up?type=bundle" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="bundle_cta" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Get all three (lowercase) - FAQ Answer" data-testid="bundle_cta_section"><span>Get all three</span></a></span><span class="medium"> and start streaming now!</span></p></div></div></section></main><footer role="contentinfo" id="footer" All Rights Reserved.<br></p></footer><div id="modal-bundle-terms-apply-2022" class="modal center" data-gv2-key="modal-bundle-terms-apply-2022"><div class="modal-content" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="overlay" data-gv2-type="overlay"><button class="close-button" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="close" data-gv2-type="button" data-testid="modal_close" aria-label="Close">×</button><div class="modal-scroller"><p><span class="medium">U.S. residents, 18+ only. Access content from each service separately. Location data required to watch certain content. Offer valid for eligible subscribers only. Subject to </span><span class="medium"><a href="https://www.disneyplus.com/legal/subscriber-agreement" target="_blank" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="modal_cta" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Terms Apply Modal - Disney+ and ESPN+ Subscriber Agreement" data-testid="mlp_link_modal"><span>Disney+ and ESPN+ Subscriber Agreement</span></a></span><span class="medium">.</span></p><p><span class="medium">For detailed information on billing and cancelation, please visit the </span><span class="medium"><a href="https://www.disneyplus.com/bundle-info" target="_blank" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="modal_cta" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link - Disney+ Help Center - 12/08/22" data-testid="mlp_link_modal"><span>Disney+ Help Center</span></a></span><span class="medium">.</span></p></div></div></div><div id="modal-ariel-learn-more-2022" class="modal center" data-gv2-key="modal-ariel-learn-more-2022"><div class="modal-content" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="overlay" data-gv2-type="overlay"><button class="close-button" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="close" data-gv2-type="button" data-testid="modal_close" aria-label="Close">×</button><div class="modal-scroller"><p><span class="medium">Due to streaming rights, a few shows are not included in the Hulu (No Ads) plan and will instead play interruption-free with a short ad break before and after each episode. Visit </span><span class="medium"><a href="https://help.hulu.com/s/" target="_blank" class="link" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="modal_cta" data-gv2-type="button" data-analytics="click" data-analytics-name="Link/Button - Hulu Help Center" data-testid="mlp_link_modal"><span>Hulu Help Center</span></a></span><span class="medium"> for a list of shows.</span></p></div></div></div><div id="modal-d-basic-additional-terms" class="modal center" data-gv2-key="modal-d-basic-additional-terms"><div class="modal-content" data-gv2-element="container" data-gv2-key="overlay" data-gv2-type="overlay"><button class="close-button" data-gv2-element="element" data-gv2-key="button" data-gv2-name="close" data-gv2-type="button" data-testid="modal_close" aria-label="Close">×</button><div class="modal-scroller"><p class="text-medium">Offer valid for a limited time only. Valid only for new Disney+ subscribers and eligible returning Disney+ subscribers with no current active subscription, who are 18 years of age or older. Upon redeeming this offer, you will be enrolled in an auto-renewing monthly subscription of Disney+ Basic (With Ads) and you will be charged the then-current retail price (currently $7.99/month, plus tax where applicable) on a monthly basis beginning at the end of your promotional offer unless you cancel your subscription before then. Cancel anytime, effective at the end of your billing period. No refunds or credits for partial months. Valid payment method required to redeem offer. Cannot be combined with any other offers, coupons, discounts or promotions. Not redeemable for cash or any other goods or services. Eligibility rules and offer timing may vary if you sign up through a third party billing partner. Terms apply. ©2023 Disney.</p></div></div></div>
